content:
Verse 1:
There once was a startup that put to work
The name of the company was the Venture Jerk
The investors all said, "It's too risky now"
O blow, my startup boys, blow

Chorus:
Soon may the VC come
To give us cash and freedom and fun
One day, when the pitchin' is done
We'll take our leave and grow

Verse 2:
We'd not been two months from launch
When down on us, the market crashed
The CEO called all hands and swore
We'd make it big, or die in tow

Chorus:
Soon may the VC come
To give us cash and freedom and fun
One day, when the pitchin' is done
We'll take our leave and grow

Post-Chorus:
Da-da, da-da-da-da
Da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da-da
Da-da, da-da-da-da
Da-da-da-da-da-da

Verse 3:
Before the plan had hit the ground
The competition came up and knocked us down
All hands to the decks, we hustled and fought her
When they dived down low

Chorus:
Soon may the VC come
To give us cash and freedom and fun
One day, when the pitchin' is done
We'll take our leave and grow

Verse 4:
No deal was made, no money freed
The CEO's mind was not of greed
And she belonged to the entrepreneur's creed
They took our dreams in tow

Chorus:
Soon may the VC come
To give us cash and freedom and fun
One day, when the pitchin' is done
We'll take our leave and grow

Post-Chorus:
Da-da, da-da-da-da
Da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da-da
Da-da, da-da-da-da
Da-da-da-da-da-da

Verse 5:
For one hundred days, or even more
The funding round went slack, then tight once more
All pitches were lost, there were only four
But still our dream did go

Chorus:
Soon may the VC come
To give us cash and freedom and fun
One day, when the pitchin' is done
We'll take our leave and grow

Verse 6:
As far as I've heard, the search goes on
The round's not closed and the dream's not gone
The VC makes their regular call
To encourage the CEO, team, and all

Chorus:
Soon may the VC come
To give us cash and freedom and fun
One day, when the pitchin' is done
We'll take our leave and grow

Outro:
Soon may the VC come
To give us cash and freedom and fun
One day, when the pitchin' is done
We'll take our leave and grow
